info.name: Birthday Widget
info.summary: Dashboard widget showing upcoming and recent birthdays from your contacts
info.description:
A simple dashboard widget that displays birthdays from your Nextcloud contacts.
**Features:** - Shows birthdays grouped by Today, Upcoming, and Recent - Displays age for each person - Configurable date range (days in past/future) - Highlights today's birthdays - Automatically synced with your contacts' birthday calendar
The widget reads birthday data from the auto-generated contact_birthdays calendar, which Nextcloud creates automatically when contacts have birthday dates set.
info.author: Florian Ludwig
